question: On which date, the 2019 edition of World Sustainable Gastronomy Day (WSGD) is observed recently?
explanation: The World Sustainable Gastronomy Day (WSGS) is observed every year on 18th of June to focus the worldâ€™s attention on the role that sustainable gastronomy can play. It also reaffirms that all cultures and civilizations are contributors and crucial enablers of sustainable development.
